text: The Kardashians are known for their elaborate birthday celebrations. Even the youngest members of their growing brood experience extravagant parties they ’ ll likely never remember. Case in point : Saint West and Reign Disick's joint birthday party. Kim Kardashian West recently shared photos to Snapchat of the cousins ’ “ Monster Mash ” - themed birthday party, and we of course noticed the little ones ’ perfectly decorated Monsters Inc. - inspired cakes. ( That ’ s right, plural because toddlers each need their own cake in this family. ) Crafted by Hansen ’ s Cakes in Los Angeles — the century - old bakery where the Kardashians get all their cakes — the birthday desserts were personalized odes to popular Monsters Inc. characters.
